pageContext.title:
Guided Fishing – Kokanee – Trout
Springtime 2018
pageContext.content:
Call (530) 338-5734

Expect great fishing through April! Weather looks great! We have excellent water conditions! Snow-capped mountains!
I offer the most fun, completely enjoyable Kokanee fishing experience for new anglers, young anglers, seasoned anglers and families of anglers! Located in Trinity County, Alex has access to awesome lakes loaded with Kokanee. right now is the best time to go fish.

Expect to catch Kokanee and Trout!

Booking your adventure starts here. Call me or fill out my contact form and expect a call from me within an hour from Alex Ross, your Trinity Guide!

Fill out the form below and expect a call back within the hour!
…or call (530) 338-5734

  • Expect a fast reply, typically within an hour.
  • Expect a call from Alex, The Trinity Guide, typically within an hour if you don't get him on the phone 1st. Make sure you leave a message 🙂

 

Find Out More About – The Trinity Guide

“Alex is a professional at whatever he does. Fishing and hunting being number one. If there’s a fish to be caught, Alex will find it! He’s a pleasure to be around and knows how to make everyone’s day one to remember. Don’t hesitate to give him a call, and get out on the water with him. You won’t regret it.”
Aaron Martin
Fisheries Biologist, Trinity River
